top_stories.title: Apple is salvaging Image Playground with a boost from ChatGPT
top_stories.description: With the new ChatGPT integration, users will be able to access more styles that move beyond the emoji-like creations that Image Playground has become known for.
top_stories.author: Aisha Malik

top_stories.title: Sam Altman-backed Coco Robotics raises $80M
top_stories.description: Coco Robotics has made more than 500,000 deliveries with its zero-emissions robots since they hit the streets in 2020.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak

top_stories.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Tutorial: Build Your First MCP Server in 6 Steps
top_stories.description:
A beginner-friendly tutorial of MCP architecture, with the focus on MCP server components and applications, guiding through the process of building a custom MCP server that enables code-to-diagram.
The post Model Context Protocol (MCP) Tutorial: Build Your First MCP Server in 6 Steps appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Destin Gong

top_stories.title: Can Scale AI and Alexandr Wang reignite Meta’s AI efforts?
top_stories.description: Meta has reportedly invested billions of dollars into AI startup Scale AI and hired its CEO, Alexandr Wang, to lead a new AI research lab. So what does that mean for Meta and the rest of the AI ecosystem?
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff

top_stories.title: US government’s vaccine website defaced with AI-generated content
top_stories.description: The content of a vaccines information website owned by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services was swapped with gay-themed spam.
top_stories.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
